channel.title: Hugo on 资深网民孙先生
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on 资深网民孙先生

item.title: Hugo Theme Farallon
item.description: Hugo Theme Farallon This theme is created using ancient methods and does not rely on third-party frameworks. Current version 0.2.6，last update 2023/10/30 Demo Github User Guide Site-wide settings Fields under [Params] description Type: string Site description. mainSections Type:[string] Default:['story'] Pages places under this/those sections will be shown on homepage and archive page. i18n In order to use a language, set DefaultContentLanguage to the language code in the configuration file.
